additional_info:
Storeroom, Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Security, Alarm System, Elevator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 A excellent offer for a family looking for a modern, comfortable apartment in a prime central neighborhood of Tbilisi!
This bright, spacious, and functional apartment is in excellent condition. Due to its location on a high floor, it is also very quiet and clean.   
An exclusive 72 m2 private open terrace is the best place to relax or socialize.
Each bedroom has its own spacious bathroom. The apartment also has an additional bathroom fitted with shower for guests.
The apartment has a laundry room and 2 storage rooms.
The storage room on the terrace is equipped with a 200-liter water reservoir, which can provide water to the whole apartment in case of a temporary water cut-off.
The apartment has a dedicated parking space, which is located very close to the building entrance.

details.address: Tbilisi, Vake,  Vake, T. Abuladze st.
